name: No Escape VI
description: Eliminate an enemy moving faster than 40km/h while at Gold tier or higher in a ranked match. Earn the Hawk-Eyed Combat Medal 200 times to complete the mission.

rewards.title: Hawk-Eyed
rewards.extra: Hawk-Eyed Combat Medal 200 times

tipsTricks.heading: How to identify enemies moving faster than 40km/h
tipsTricks.description: Enemies moving faster than 40km/h are typically using vehicles or engaging in high-speed movement like sprinting or driving motorcycles. Keep an eye on these players as they are more challenging to hit and eliminate. Use vehicles yourself to catch up with fast-moving enemies.

tipsTricks.heading: Tips for Gold tier players
tipsTricks.description: To complete this mission, you must be in Gold tier or higher. Make sure to focus on improving your rank before attempting to complete this mission. Play strategically, securing high-kill matches and focusing on winning to maintain your Gold status.

tipsTricks.heading: Eliminating fast-moving enemies
tipsTricks.description: Eliminating enemies that are moving at high speeds requires precision and good weapon control. Try to use weapons with high accuracy at long range, like the M416 or Kar98k, and focus on leading your shots. Tracking moving targets can be tough, so always aim a bit ahead of their movement trajectory.

requirements.heading: Eliminate an enemy moving faster than 40km/h
requirements.description: You need to eliminate an enemy who is moving at more than 40km/h, either by vehicle or sprinting at high speed. Watch for players who are using motorcycles or vehicles to zip around the map.

requirements.heading: Be at Gold tier or higher in ranked mode
requirements.description: Make sure you're playing in ranked mode and have reached Gold tier or higher. If you're not in Gold tier yet, focus on improving your skills and rank through ranked matches to reach this tier.

requirements.heading: Win the Hawk-Eyed Combat Medal 200 times
requirements.description: Win the Hawk-Eyed Combat Medal a total of 200 times. This can be achieved by successfully completing missions or challenges that reward the medal, or through excellent combat performance in ranked matches.

tipsTricks.description: To complete this mission, you must be in Gold tier or higher. Focus on improving your rank before attempting the mission. Participate in ranked matches to secure wins and maintain your Gold tier. A higher kill count and placement in these matches will also increase your chances of success.

tipsTricks.heading: Eliminating fast-moving enemies
tipsTricks.description: Eliminating fast-moving enemies requires precision and good weapon control. Use high-accuracy long-range weapons like M416 or AWM. Aim ahead of the target's movement to predict where they will be, and lead your shots accordingly.

requirements.heading: Eliminate an enemy moving faster than 40km/h

requirements.description: Make sure you're playing in ranked mode and have reached Gold tier or higher. If you're not in Gold tier yet, work on improving your ranking through focused efforts in ranked matches. Keep an eye on your win rate, kills, and placement.

tipsTricks.heading: Long-Range Weapons for Speedy Enemies
tipsTricks.description: Fast-moving enemies can be tricky to hit, so using long-range weapons like the M416 or Kar98k is crucial. These weapons offer good accuracy at long distances. Lead your shots when aiming at fast-moving players to account for their movement.

requirements.heading: Win the Hawk-Eyed Combat Medal 50 Times

tipsTricks.heading: Master High-Pressure Situations
tipsTricks.description: To achieve an 'S' rating, you need to perform exceptionally well under pressure. Focus on getting high kill counts, excellent survival time, and superior damage output in intense situations.

tipsTricks.heading: Optimal Strategy and Teamplay
tipsTricks.description: Collaborate closely with your squad. Strategy, teamwork, and smart positioning are key. Aim for team eliminations and avoid unnecessary risks.

tipsTricks.description: To achieve an 'S' rating, you need to perform consistently well across different matches. Regularly refine your skills and avoid falling into bad habits.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Aggressively, But Smartly
tipsTricks.description: You need to eliminate enemies efficiently while maintaining great survival time. Use your aggression strategically and avoid unnecessary risks that might hurt your rating.

tipsTricks.description: Maximize your effectiveness by mastering the game's mechanics, weapons, and maps. Knowledge of terrain, loot spots, and positioning will give you a critical advantage.

tipsTricks.heading: Achieve Perfection
tipsTricks.description: To achieve an 'SSS' rating, you need to perform perfectly in nearly every match. This involves getting high kill counts, excellent survival, dealing massive damage, and making smart decisions throughout the game.

tipsTricks.heading: Sharpen Your Skills
tipsTricks.description: Master every aspect of the game. Consistent high-level performance is key, so work on your shooting accuracy, positioning, and strategic decision-making to stay ahead.

tipsTricks.heading: Solo or Squad, Consistency Matters
tipsTricks.description: Whether playing solo or in squads, maintain a high level of consistency across your matches. Always aim to deliver peak performance to ensure the rating is within reach.

requirements.heading: Get a rating of 'SSS' or above
requirements.description: To complete this mission, you must achieve an 'SSS' rating or above in twenty separate ranked matches.

name: PUBG Elite V
description: Achieve a rating of 'SSS' or above fifty times in ranked matches to unlock the ultimate level of elite status.

rewards.title: PUBG Elite V
rewards.extra: The most exclusive rewards, including legendary skins, titles, and badges not available anywhere else.

tipsTricks.heading: Perfection in Every Match
tipsTricks.description: To achieve an 'SSS' rating 50 times, you must maintain perfect performance in a large number of matches. Focus on eliminating opponents efficiently, surviving until the end, and maximizing damage output.

tipsTricks.heading: Master Every Aspect of Gameplay
tipsTricks.description: SSS ratings require you to be exceptional in all areas of the game. Work on perfecting your aiming, map knowledge, strategy, teamwork (if in squads), and decision-making. Consistency is crucial.

tipsTricks.heading: Adapt to Different Scenarios
tipsTricks.description: Each match is different, so flexibility is key. Whether you are playing aggressive or defensive, adapting to various situations will help you maintain high performance, and therefore, higher ratings.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Calm and Focused
tipsTricks.description: SSS ratings come from consistently great decision-making under pressure. Focus on your strategy and avoid panicking during intense moments.

requirements.heading: Get a rating of 'SSS' or above
requirements.description: To complete this mission, you must achieve an 'SSS' rating or above in fifty separate ranked matches.

name: Chicken Bucket I
description: Win a match in Classic mode to unlock this achievement. Celebrate your first victory with a bucket of chicken!

rewards.title: Chicken Winner
rewards.extra: Unlock a special in-game badge to show off your victory.

tipsTricks.heading: Play It Safe and Smart
tipsTricks.description: Focus on survival and take your time to gather resources. Avoid unnecessary fights and focus on positioning yourself for the final stages of the match.

tipsTricks.heading: Teamwork in Squads
tipsTricks.description: If playing in a squad, communication and cooperation are key. Work together to eliminate enemies and stay alive until the final circle.

tipsTricks.heading: Know the Map
tipsTricks.description: Familiarize yourself with the map to know where to find the best loot, safe zones, and ideal places to hide or ambush opponents.

requirements.heading: Win 1 time in Classic mode
requirements.description: To complete this mission, you simply need to win one match in Classic mode, either solo or with a squad.

name: Chicken Bucket II
description: Win 5 matches in Classic mode (Solo, Duo, or Squad) to unlock this achievement and prove you're a true winner in PUBG.

rewards.title: Chicken Champion
rewards.extra: Unlock a special badge to show off your expertise in securing multiple wins.

tipsTricks.heading: Consistency Is Key
tipsTricks.description: Winning five times requires consistent performance. Focus on staying alive, improving your shooting accuracy, and learning the best spots to loot and hide.

tipsTricks.heading: Work With Your Team
tipsTricks.description: In Squads or Duos, teamwork is essential. Make sure to communicate with your team, plan strategies, and support each other to secure victories.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Calm in the Final Zones
tipsTricks.description: As the play zone shrinks, it's important to stay calm and avoid panicking. Focus on your positioning and use cover effectively to outlast your opponents.

requirements.heading: Win 5 times in Classic mode
requirements.description: To complete this mission, you need to win five matches in Classic mode, whether playing Solo, Duo, or Squad.

name: Chicken Bucket III
description: Win 10 matches in Classic mode (Solo, Duo, Squad) to unlock this prestigious achievement and show your mastery in PUBG. Play unranked matches for rating protection while working toward your victory!

rewards.title: Chicken King
rewards.extra: Unlock an exclusive badge and additional in-game rewards, such as rare skins or other prestigious items.

tipsTricks.heading: Master Your Gameplay
tipsTricks.description: To win 10 times, you'll need to refine your gameplay. Focus on perfecting your combat, positioning, and decision-making across multiple matches.

tipsTricks.heading: Cooperate and Communicate
tipsTricks.description: Especially in Duo or Squad modes, communication and teamwork are essential. Share your resources, cover your teammates, and plan your strategy to increase your chances of victory.

tipsTricks.heading: Adapt to the Circle
tipsTricks.description: As the play zone shrinks, positioning becomes crucial. Learn how to adapt to the changing zones, anticipate enemy movements, and use cover to your advantage.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Unranked Matches for Rating Protection
tipsTricks.description: If you’re concerned about your ranking or just want to practice, consider playing unranked matches. This will allow you to focus on improving your skills without affecting your rating.

requirements.heading: Classic mode (Solo, Duo, Squad, or Quad)
requirements.description: This achievement applies to Classic mode matches, whether played Solo, Duo, Squad, or Quad.

requirements.heading: Win 10 Classic matches
requirements.description: To complete this mission, you need to win 10 matches in Classic mode, whether playing Solo, Duo, Squad, or Quad.

requirements.heading: Play Unranked Matches for Rating Protection
requirements.description: While working toward your wins, you may choose to play unranked matches for rating protection. This ensures that you can play without affecting your rank while still focusing on improving your skills.

name: Chicken Bucket IV
description: Win 20 matches in Classic mode (Solo, Duo, or Squad) to unlock this advanced achievement. Prove that you're a true PUBG champion with multiple wins!

rewards.title: Chicken Master
rewards.extra: Unlock an exclusive in-game badge and possibly some rare loot or skins to show off your top-tier achievements.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Persistent and Adapt
tipsTricks.description: Winning 20 times will take time and persistence. Stay adaptable and refine your strategies as you progress. Understand how to rotate, manage resources, and position yourself to outlast opponents.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Smart, Not Just Hard
tipsTricks.description: Focus on survival and strategy, rather than aggressive play. Carefully analyze the circle's movement and avoid rushing into risky fights. Take your time and plan your engagements.

tipsTricks.heading: Team Synergy is Crucial (Duo/Squad)
tipsTricks.description: In Duo or Squad mode, effective communication and coordination are key to securing victories. Work with your team to control areas, revive teammates, and cover each other.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Unranked Matches for Practice
tipsTricks.description: If you're struggling to win or need to practice, consider playing unranked matches. This allows you to improve your skills without affecting your ranking.

requirements.heading: Classic mode (Solo, Duo, or Squad)
requirements.description: This achievement applies to Classic mode matches, whether played Solo, Duo, or Squad.

requirements.heading: Win 20 Classic matches
requirements.description: To complete this mission, you need to win 20 matches in Classic mode. This can be done across Solo, Duo, or Squad matches.

name: Chicken Bucket V
description: Win 50 matches in Classic mode (Solo, Duo, or Squad) to unlock this ultimate achievement. Prove yourself as a PUBG legend by dominating the battlefield with numerous victories!

rewards.title: PUBG Legend
rewards.extra: Unlock an exclusive in-game title and unique rewards such as legendary skins or other prestigious items to showcase your elite status.

tipsTricks.heading: Consistent Strategy is Key
tipsTricks.description: Winning 50 times is a long-term commitment. Stay consistent in your strategy, adapt to the changing play zones, and avoid unnecessary risks. Focus on survival and efficient resource management.

tipsTricks.heading: Enhance Your Teamplay
tipsTricks.description: Especially in Duo or Squad modes, teamwork is essential. Build a reliable team, communicate effectively, and share resources to maximize your chances of winning.

tipsTricks.heading: Practice Makes Perfect
tipsTricks.description: If you're struggling to win, practice your shooting, positioning, and map awareness in unranked or low-pressure matches. Every small improvement counts toward reaching your 50 wins.

tipsTricks.heading: Take Advantage of Safe Zones
tipsTricks.description: Master the art of positioning. Familiarize yourself with the shrinking safe zones and learn how to stay inside them while taking advantage of the terrain and cover.

requirements.heading: Classic mode (Solo, Duo, or Squad)
requirements.description: This achievement applies to Classic mode matches, whether played Solo, Duo, or Squad.

requirements.heading: Win 50 Classic matches
requirements.description: To complete this mission, you need to win 50 matches in Classic mode. This can be done across Solo, Duo, or Squad matches.

name: Master Sniper I
description: Eliminate an enemy from a distance of 250 meters or more while at Gold tier or higher in a ranked Classic mode match to unlock the prestigious Long Bomber title. Additionally, win the Sharpshooter Combat Medal 1 time to complete this mission.

rewards.title: Long Bomber
rewards.extra: Unlock the prestigious Long Bomber title and in-game rewards like special sniper skins or other exclusive items.

tipsTricks.heading: Get to Gold Tier or Higher
tipsTricks.description: To complete this achievement, you must be in Gold tier or higher in a ranked Classic mode match. Focus on climbing the ranks and winning matches to reach Gold and beyond.

tipsTricks.heading: Master Long-Range Sniping
tipsTricks.description: To eliminate an enemy from 250 meters or more, practice long-range sniping with high-powered scopes like the 8x or 15x. Ensure you have a good understanding of bullet drop and leading your target.

tipsTricks.heading: Use the Right Equipment
tipsTricks.description: Make sure you are equipped with the best sniper rifles, such as the Kar98k, M24, or AWM, which offer high damage and accuracy at long ranges.

tipsTricks.heading: Sharpshooter Combat Medal
tipsTricks.description: Win the Sharpshooter Combat Medal by getting multiple eliminations using precision shots. Focus on taking down enemies with headshots or quick eliminations to unlock this medal.

requirements.heading: Ranked Classic Mode
requirements.description: This achievement can only be completed in **Ranked Classic Mode** matches, whether Solo, Duo, or Squad.

requirements.heading: Eliminate an Enemy from 250 meters
requirements.description: To complete this achievement, eliminate an enemy from a distance of 250 meters or more while in Gold tier or higher in a ranked Classic mode match.

requirements.heading: Win the Sharpshooter Combat Medal 1 time
requirements.description: Win the Sharpshooter Combat Medal by eliminating an enemy with precision shots in the match.

name: Master Sniper II
description: Eliminate an enemy from a distance of 250 meters or more while at Gold tier or higher in a ranked Classic mode match to unlock the prestigious Long Bomber title. Additionally, win the Sharpshooter Combat Medal 5 times to complete this advanced mission.

rewards.title: Long Bomber II
rewards.extra: Unlock the advanced Long Bomber II title and exclusive rewards, including special sniper skins and other high-level achievements.

tipsTricks.heading: Achieve Gold Tier or Higher in Ranked Classic Mode
tipsTricks.description: To complete this mission, you must reach Gold tier or higher in **Ranked Classic Mode**. Focus on playing matches with high placement and eliminations to boost your rank. Prioritize teamwork in squads or duos for better coordination, and aim for a consistent top-tier performance to climb the ranks faster.

tipsTricks.heading: Master Sniping from 250 Meters or More
tipsTricks.description: To eliminate enemies from 250 meters or more, you need to master sniper rifles with high accuracy. Weapons like the **AWM**, **M24**, and **Kar98k** with scopes like **8x** or **15x** will help. **Compensate for bullet drop** by aiming slightly above your target, especially in longer ranges. Practice on smaller maps with long sightlines to get a feel for the distance and drop.

tipsTricks.heading: Understanding Bullet Drop and Range
tipsTricks.description: At long ranges (250 meters or more), bullet drop becomes a significant factor. **Aim higher** than the target’s head to account for the drop. Try using training mode to test distances and adjust your aim accordingly. Practice at different distances to get a feel for bullet travel time, drop, and leading moving targets.

tipsTricks.heading: Winning the Sharpshooter Combat Medal
tipsTricks.description: The **Sharpshooter Combat Medal** is earned by getting accurate eliminations, often with headshots or well-timed shots. **Use high-powered scopes** for better accuracy, and keep your crosshair aimed at enemy head height when engaging. **Eliminate players with precision** from mid to long-range and avoid missing your shots to maximize your chances of earning the medal multiple times.

tipsTricks.heading: Maximize Your Positioning for Long-Range Shots
tipsTricks.description: Positioning is key for long-range sniping. Always find **high ground** or areas with a clear line of sight to enemies. This allows you to engage enemies from a safe distance without being exposed. **Keep moving** between shots to avoid being detected by enemy players looking for snipers.

requirements.heading: Ranked Classic Mode
requirements.description: This achievement must be completed in **Ranked Classic Mode** matches, whether Solo, Duo, or Squad.

requirements.heading: Eliminate an Enemy from 250 meters
requirements.description: Eliminate an enemy from a distance of 250 meters or more while at Gold tier or higher in a ranked Classic mode match.

requirements.heading: Win the Sharpshooter Combat Medal 5 times
requirements.description: To complete this achievement, you need to win the Sharpshooter Combat Medal 5 times by securing eliminations with precision shots.

name: Master Sniper III
description: Eliminate an enemy from a distance of 250 meters or more while at Gold tier or higher in a ranked match to earn the prestigious Long Bomber title. Additionally, win the Sharpshooter Combat Medal 20 times to fully complete this challenging mission.

rewards.title: Long Bomber III
rewards.extra: Unlock the elite Long Bomber III title, exclusive sniper skins, and special in-game rewards that mark your sniping expertise.

tipsTricks.heading: Climbing to Gold Tier or Higher in Ranked Matches
tipsTricks.description: You must reach **Gold tier or higher** in **Ranked Matches** to start the mission. Rank up by consistently performing well and surviving in matches, focusing on placing in the top spots and getting eliminations. Solo or Duo mode is easier for personal performance, while Squad mode offers more opportunities for teamwork and achieving high placements.

tipsTricks.heading: Sharpshooter Combat Medal 20 Times
tipsTricks.description: To win the **Sharpshooter Combat Medal** 20 times, you need to make consistent **precise long-range shots**. Focus on sniping with rifles like the **AWM** and **M24**. Prioritize accuracy over speed, aiming for **headshots** or **clean kills** at long distances. The more headshots you land, the more likely you are to win the medal.

tipsTricks.heading: Long-Range Eliminations (250 Meters or More)
tipsTricks.description: You need to **eliminate an enemy from 250 meters or more** using sniper rifles like **AWM**, **M24**, or **Kar98k**. For long-range kills, use **8x** or **15x scopes** to get a clear line of sight. Remember, **bullet drop** and **wind** affect your shot at such distances. Aim above the target's head to compensate for drop and lead your shots if the enemy is moving.

tipsTricks.heading: Sniping Locations and Positioning
tipsTricks.description: For long-range eliminations, position yourself on **high ground** or **hillsides** where you have clear visibility. Choose spots that are far from enemy lines of sight to avoid getting detected after a shot. Always use **natural cover** like rocks or trees to stay hidden and relocate after each kill to avoid being tracked.

tipsTricks.heading: Using Sniper Rifles Effectively
tipsTricks.description: Master sniper rifles such as the **AWM**, **M24**, and **Kar98k**. The **AWM** is the most powerful sniper, while the **M24** and **Kar98k** are more common but still very effective. Practice compensating for bullet drop, especially at distances of 250 meters or more. **Slow and steady shots** are more effective than quick, rushed shots when sniping.

tipsTricks.heading: Bullet Drop
tipsTricks.description: When shooting at distances of **250 meters or more**, you must account for **bullet drop**. The higher the distance, the more your bullet will fall, so aim **above** your target to compensate for this. As a rule of thumb, start by aiming at the **top of the enemy's head** and adjust according to how far they are. The **AWM** drops less than other rifles, but all sniper rifles require this adjustment at long range.

requirements.heading: Ranked Mode (Solo, Duo, Squad)
requirements.description: This achievement must be completed in **Ranked Mode**, either in **Solo**, **Duo**, or **Squad** mode. Focus on maintaining a **Gold tier or higher** rank to achieve this mission.

requirements.heading: Eliminate at 250 Meters or More
requirements.description: Eliminate an enemy from **250 meters or more** using sniper rifles while at **Gold tier or higher** in a **Ranked Match**.

requirements.heading: Win Sharpshooter Combat Medal 20 Times
requirements.description: Win the **Sharpshooter Combat Medal** 20 times by getting clean, accurate eliminations with sniper rifles, especially at long range.

name: Master Sniper IV
description: Eliminate an enemy from a distance of 250 meters or more while at **Gold tier or higher** in a **Ranked Match** to earn the prestigious **Long Bomber** title. Additionally, win the **Sharpshooter Combat Medal 50 times** to fully complete this challenging achievement and prove your mastery in sniping.

rewards.title: Long Bomber IV
rewards.extra: Unlock the elite **Long Bomber IV** title, sniper-specific skins, and exclusive in-game rewards that reflect your sniping dominance.

tipsTricks.heading: Climbing to Gold Tier or Higher in Ranked Matches
tipsTricks.description: To participate in this achievement, you must be at **Gold tier or higher** in **Ranked Matches**. Focus on consistently placing in the **top positions** and getting **kills**. Solo or Duo mode might be more manageable for maintaining a high rank, but Squad mode can offer more opportunities for kills and teamwork.

tipsTricks.heading: Sharpshooter Combat Medal 50 Times
tipsTricks.description: You need to win the **Sharpshooter Combat Medal** **50 times**. This requires you to perform **precise long-range eliminations** consistently. Aim for **headshots** from long distances and use sniper rifles like the **AWM**, **M24**, or **Kar98k** for clean kills. The more **headshots** you get, the quicker you’ll rack up these medals.

tipsTricks.heading: Long-Range Eliminations (250 Meters or More)
tipsTricks.description: You need to **eliminate an enemy from 250 meters or more** in **Ranked matches** while at **Gold tier or higher**. For accurate long-range shots, use **8x**, **15x**, or higher scopes. Ensure you’re compensating for **bullet drop** and **wind** while aiming above the target to increase your chances of landing the shot.

tipsTricks.heading: Using Sniper Rifles Effectively
tipsTricks.description: Master sniper rifles like the **AWM**, **M24**, and **Kar98k** for long-range shots. The **AWM** offers the highest damage, but the **M24** and **Kar98k** are reliable and easier to find. For **250-meter eliminations**, you need to understand **bullet drop** and **lead your shots**. Stay patient and only shoot when you're confident in your aim.

tipsTricks.heading: Bullet Drop
tipsTricks.description: When shooting at **250 meters or more**, consider **bullet drop**. At these distances, your bullet will naturally fall, so aim **above** the target's head. The **AWM** has the least bullet drop, but even with this weapon, the adjustment is still necessary. Practice in training mode or on custom maps to get a feel for how much to aim above your target at longer distances.

tipsTricks.heading: Positioning and Stealth
tipsTricks.description: For long-range eliminations, always choose spots that give you a **clear line of sight** while staying hidden. **High ground** or **hillsides** offer the best visibility. After each elimination, move positions to avoid getting spotted by enemies. Consider using **natural cover** like rocks, trees, or terrain features.

requirements.heading: Ranked Mode (Solo, Duo, Squad)
requirements.description: This achievement must be completed in **Ranked Mode**. You must be in **Gold tier or higher** to be eligible. Focus on consistent performance and winning in **Solo**, **Duo**, or **Squad** modes.

requirements.heading: Eliminate at 250 Meters or More
requirements.description: Eliminate an enemy from **250 meters or more** using sniper rifles while at **Gold tier or higher** in a **Ranked Match**.

requirements.heading: Win Sharpshooter Combat Medal 50 Times
requirements.description: Win the **Sharpshooter Combat Medal** **50 times** by consistently getting long-range eliminations with sniper rifles.

name: Master Sniper V
description: Eliminate an enemy from a distance of 250 meters or more while at Gold tier or higher in a Ranked Match to earn the prestigious Long Bomber title. Additionally, win the Sharpshooter Combat Medal 100 times to fully complete this elite-level achievement and solidify your mastery in sniping.

rewards.title: Long Bomber V
rewards.extra: Unlock the elite Long Bomber V title, sniper-exclusive skins, and significant in-game rewards that showcase your dominance in long-range eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Climbing to Gold Tier or Higher in Ranked Matches
tipsTricks.description: To complete this achievement, you must be at Gold tier or higher in Ranked Matches. Maintain consistent performance by securing high placements and making long-range eliminations. Solo or Duo mode can be easier for individual performance, but Squad mode gives you more opportunities to get eliminations and work with teammates.

tipsTricks.heading: Sharpshooter Combat Medal 100 Times
tipsTricks.description: Winning the Sharpshooter Combat Medal 100 times requires consistently securing long-range eliminations, especially with headshots. The more precise your shots are, the faster you’ll accumulate these medals. Use sniper rifles like AWM, M24, and Kar98k for the best performance.

tipsTricks.heading: Long-Range Eliminations (250 Meters or More)
tipsTricks.description: For a 250-meter or more elimination, use high magnification scopes like 8x, 15x, or even higher. AWM, M24, and Kar98k are recommended. Learn the nuances of bullet drop and adjust your aim accordingly. Taking shots from elevated positions like hills or rooftops can help you get the necessary range.

tipsTricks.heading: Sniper Rifle Mastery
tipsTricks.description: Master sniper rifles like the AWM, M24, and Kar98k. The AWM is the most powerful sniper, capable of one-shot kills from long distances. The M24 and Kar98k are easier to find and still very effective. Focus on aiming for headshots as they will get you medals faster and increase your eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Bullet Drop and Wind Factor Tip
tipsTricks.description: At 250 meters, always account for bullet drop. Aim above the target to compensate for this. Wind can also affect your shot, so try to lead your target and adjust for the wind's direction. AWM has the least bullet drop, but regardless of the sniper, always practice this skill in training or custom matches.

tipsTricks.heading: Positioning for Long-Range Shots
tipsTricks.description: When attempting long-range eliminations, positioning is key. Find high ground or areas with clear lines of sight to your target. After getting an elimination, change positions quickly to avoid being detected by other players. Use natural cover like rocks or trees to keep yourself hidden.

requirements.heading: Ranked Mode (Solo, Duo, Squad)
requirements.description: This achievement must be completed in Ranked Mode while being in Gold tier or higher. Make sure you're consistently placing high and getting eliminations in Solo, Duo, or Squad mode.

requirements.heading: Eliminate at 250 Meters or More
requirements.description: You must eliminate an enemy from 250 meters or more with a sniper rifle while at Gold tier or higher in a Ranked Match.

requirements.heading: Win Sharpshooter Combat Medal 100 Times
requirements.description: You need to win the Sharpshooter Combat Medal 100 times by consistently getting long-range eliminations with sniper rifles.

name: Master Sniper VI
description: Eliminate an enemy from a distance of 250 meters or more while at Gold tier or higher in a Ranked Match to earn the prestigious Long Bomber title. Additionally, win the Sharpshooter Combat Medal 200 times to solidify your status as a true master of long-range eliminations in PUBG.

rewards.title: Long Bomber VI
rewards.extra: Unlock the exclusive Long Bomber VI title, rare sniper skins, and major in-game rewards as you prove your dominance with 250-meter eliminations and countless Sharpshooter Medals.

tipsTricks.heading: Sharpshooter Combat Medal 200 Times
tipsTricks.description: Winning the Sharpshooter Combat Medal 200 times requires consistent long-range eliminations. Prioritize headshots and aim for moving targets. The faster you eliminate, the more medals you’ll win. Choose sniper rifles like AWM, M24, and Kar98k for maximum efficiency in ranked matches.

tipsTricks.heading: Mastering 250m Eliminations
tipsTricks.description: Eliminate enemies at 250 meters or more by using high-powered sniper rifles and long-range scopes like 8x or 15x. Always account for bullet drop at such long distances, and adjust your aim accordingly. You can practice your range accuracy in training modes or custom matches to improve your shooting distance.

tipsTricks.heading: Ranked Matches and Gold Tier
tipsTricks.description: This achievement requires you to be at Gold tier or higher in Ranked Mode. Focus on improving your overall placement in matches and consistent kills. Aim for high positions, and ensure you're taking out enemies at long distances to boost your medal count and help you progress toward the next Sharpshooter Combat Medal.

tipsTricks.heading: Optimal Sniper Rifle Setup
tipsTricks.description: Use powerful sniper rifles like AWM, M24, or Kar98k for the best performance. Equip them with high-zoom scopes like 8x, 15x, or 20x to maximize your distance advantage. Remember to practice controlling the rifle recoil and bullet drop to consistently hit your targets at long distances.

tipsTricks.heading: Positional Awareness
tipsTricks.description: High ground gives you a clear line of sight for long-range eliminations. Consider positioning yourself on rooftops, hills, or other elevated areas. Once you spot a target, take your shot, but immediately relocate to avoid being spotted by enemies. Movement and stealth are key when engaging from 250 meters or more.

requirements.heading: Ranked Mode (Solo, Duo, Squad)
requirements.description: This achievement must be completed in Ranked Mode while being in Gold tier or higher. Make sure you’re performing consistently well in these matches.

requirements.heading: Eliminate at 250 Meters or More
requirements.description: You must eliminate an enemy from 250 meters or more in a Ranked Match while at Gold tier or higher.

requirements.heading: Win Sharpshooter Combat Medal 200 Times
requirements.description: You need to win the Sharpshooter Combat Medal 200 times by consistently securing long-range eliminations with sniper rifles.
